Nightlight::

"Perhaps... they were looking for something... "replied Nightlight


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Wheeljack-X::
> 
> "I have no idea," Jackie responds, puzzled.  "There wasn't anything 
> of value on my ship.  I must've cut them off at an intersection or 
> something - you know what road rage can do.  The screwy part was, I 
> didn't have a clue they were there until this ship just appears out 
> of nowhere and starts shooting at me.  I assumed they were pirates 
> 'cause the only identification on the ship was a big black skull."
> 
> He scratches his chin.  "Now that I think of it, I did manage to 
find 
> a match in my ship's database for that logo - a terrorist 
> organization that call themselves the Rogues.  Really nasty, by all 
> accounts."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Nightlight::
> > 
> > 
> > "Space pirates??"said Nightlight"what did they like of you?"
